QuestData.Title: Filthy Paws
QuestData.Description: The Silver Stream Mine to the east ran dry long ago. It was converted by the Miners' League into a storage depot, but now kobolds have moved in, putting their filthy paws on good, dwarven tools!$B$BWe'll root out those vermin soon enough, but the League wants someone to get their gear out of the mine before we warriors tromp in there and break things. It'll be a tough delve - you might want cohorts at your side.$B$BThe gear is stored in Miners' League Crates throughout the mine. Good luck.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 6 loads of Miners' Gear from the Silver Stream Mine.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have that Miners' Gear, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Did you see a lot of kobolds in there? The thought of their grimy hands clawing around our mine makes my stomach rumble!
